ygData.subject: Re: New Topic, Languages!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: to get skill gains they have to talk ALOT in that language.  What we do in our group is set up a button to say something, switch to whatever exotic language,
ygData.messageBody:
to get skill gains they have to talk ALOT in that language. What we do
in our group is set up a button to say something, switch to whatever
exotic language, and click click click click a few hundred times. We
only do this while meditating/resting though.

I picked up gnoll also, but didn't hear it from a PC so must have picked
it up from the gnolls in BB. I noticed I understood the gnolls this
weekend before I saw I had the skill in my skillset. They say some
funny stuff sometimes.

Remember to switch back to common when done! Nothing worse than yelling
for help and people seeing "xylb!" instead of "help!".

-----Original Message-----
From: Shane Murphy [mailto:shanem@...]
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 2:45 PM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: New Topic, Languages!!!


From: "Shane Murphy" <shanem@...>

How do you start learning a new Language? I have been around elves
talking
Elvish before, but noticed no skill gain or message.


Tuannon
Bristlebane

only

>
>Tiresias
